meanings.definition: A person who adheres to a philosophy of extreme realism.
meanings.sent1: As an ultrarealist, she always focused on the harsh truths of life.
meanings.sent2: The ultrarealist believed in facing reality head-on, no matter how difficult.
meanings.sent3: The ultrarealist joked that they saw the world in high-definition while others were stuck in standard.
meanings.sent4: Her ultrarealist perspective was like a magnifying glass, revealing every detail of the world.
meanings.sent5: In a world of dreamers, the ultrarealist stood out for their unwavering commitment to truth.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to an extreme form of realism.
meanings.sent1: The film director's ultrarealist style captured every detail of everyday life.
meanings.sent2: Her ultrarealist paintings depicted scenes with incredible precision and accuracy.
meanings.sent3: The ultrarealist approach to cooking meant using only the freshest, most natural ingredients.
meanings.sent4: His ultrarealist view of the world made even the mundane seem extraordinary.
meanings.sent5: The ultrarealist design of the building emphasized functionality over aesthetics.
